description.value:
You attempt to dazzle a creature, drawing it into a lull and instilling it with an irresistible compulsion to come closer. It must make a Wisdom (Save) check, and does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting it. If it fails the saving throw, it is @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.KJXJ0T5RPNC51N4V]{Charmed} by you until the spell ends or until you or your companions do anything harmful to it.

While the creature is @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.KJXJ0T5RPNC51N4V]{Charmed} by this spell, it cannot willingly move further away from you. On each of your turns, you can use a minor action to compel a creature under the spell’s effect to immediately move up to half its speed closer to you. The creature avoids hazardous terrain to the best of its ability and stops moving if it reaches a point where there is no safe terrain to proceed along.

Charge: This is a spell that can be Charged, modifying its effects. Costs and effects are as follow:

  • 1 Mana: You can target an additional creature.
  • 2 Mana: While the target is @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.KJXJ0T5RPNC51N4V]{Charmed} by this spell, it must make a Wisdom (Save) check at the start of each of its turns. On a failure, the target is @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.3CQC3JEY2C3Y721F]{Incapacitated} until the start of its next turn.
  • 3 Mana: You can target two additional creatures.
